alert.note: Alert for Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 1:03AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Trumbull County through 200 AM EDT... At 103 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kinsman to near West Farmington. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Warren, Sharon, Niles, Cortland, Kinsman, North Bloomfield, West Farmington, Bristolville, Vienna Center, Leavittsburg, Vienna, Mecca, Johnston, Orangeville, Yankee Lake, Brookfield Center, Howland Center, West Hill, Turnpike Interchange and Champion Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
